remedies.name: Simple weekly giving
remedies.description: Once a week, offer a small, comfortable amount or useful item to someone who genuinely needs support, with a relaxed and generous attitude.
remedies.safety_notes: Give only within your financial comfort; there should be no fear or pressure around giving.

remedies.name: Breath awareness for money stress
remedies.description: Spend 10â€“15 minutes focusing on slow, steady breathing while gently acknowledging and relaxing worries about business or income.
remedies.safety_notes: Practice in a comfortable posture; stop if you feel strain or discomfort.

remedies.name: Share food or resources
remedies.description: Regularly share a small portion of food or resources with people, animals or initiatives connected to nourishment and stability.
remedies.safety_notes: Ensure safe and hygienic sharing; respect local guidelines and personal boundaries.

remedies.name: Abundance mindset reflection
remedies.description: Once a day, reflect for a few minutes on areas where life is already providing enough, supporting a calmer attitude towards money.
remedies.safety_notes: Use this to balance fear, not to avoid practical financial planning.

remedies.name: Support skill-building or education
remedies.description: Whenever possible, support skill-building, education or training efforts that help you or others create more sustainable income.
remedies.safety_notes: Invest only in learning or initiatives you have reasonably researched and trust.

remedies.name: Calm decision affirmation
remedies.description: Before major financial choices, repeat a brief affirmation such as "I decide with clarity, care and patience" to steady your mindset.
remedies.safety_notes: Use this to support clear thinking, while still checking facts and, when necessary, consulting professionals.

remedies.name: Short financial clarity pause
remedies.description: Take a few slow breaths and observe your thoughts about money for a couple of minutes before acting, so that reactions become more thoughtful.
remedies.safety_notes: If financial stress feels overwhelming, consider seeking personalised guidance from a qualified advisor or counsellor.
